full_text:
Ferrari Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
1 min
Chilling Time
15 mins
Total
20 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
Fernet Branca
1 1/2
ounces
Campari
Directions
Place rocks glass in freezer at least 15 minutes before starting to make cocktail. Fill mixing glass 2/3rds full with ice. Add Fernet and Campari. Stir until drink is well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into chilled rocks glass. Serve.
Special equipment
rocks glass, mixing glass, mixing spoon, jigger, cocktail strainer
